definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Things didn't say, embroider line, color is not bright bright.
sentences.chinese: 东西没得说，绣线光亮不起球，颜色十分鲜艳。

sentences.english: If, at the end of the season, the owner decides my job was not good enough, this is not a problem.
sentences.chinese: 如果赛季末，他觉得这成绩不好，也没得说的。
